thread.title: BRIEF-Edgewater Technology says On March 16, Timothy Oakes, Co's CFO, Gave Notice Of His Resignation, Resignation Effective As Of April 13

title: BRIEF-Edgewater Technology says On March 16, Timothy Oakes, Co's CFO, Gave Notice Of His Resignation, Resignation Effective As Of April 13
text: Market News March 20, 2018 / 10:36 PM / Updated 14 minutes ago BRIEF-Edgewater Technology says On March 16, Timothy Oakes, Co's CFO, Gave Notice Of His Resignation, Resignation Effective As Of April 13 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 20 (Reuters) - Edgewater Technology Inc: * EDGEWATER TECHNOLOGY-‍ON MARCH 16, TIMOTHY OAKES, CO'S CFO, GAVE NOTICE OF HIS RESIGNATION, WHICH RESIGNATION WILL BE EFFECTIVE AS OF APRIL 13, 2018​ Source text - bit.ly/2pqKZL0 Further company coverage:
